level.heading: Effective date of the plan.
level.text: A plan shall become effective when the Commissioner has approved the plan.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 13-214 rewrote the section which had read:
"A plan shall become effective when the Commissioner has approved the plan, the members have approved the plan, and the revised articles of incorporation have been filed."

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-126
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-126, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-901.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-81
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-81, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-901.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-214
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-214, see notes following § 31-902.
